explains: adj. 不合规格的；标准以下的

sentences.en: It comes as a shock to us that some milk powder producers produce substandard milk powder which would bring harm to babies.
sentences.cn: 一些奶粉生产商生产有害婴儿的不合格奶粉，这让我们感到很震惊。

sentences.en: The cold has made already substandard living conditions even worse.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的天气使得原本就低于正常水平的生活条件更加低劣。

sentences.en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in substandard housing.
sentences.cn: 居民一般都很穷、受教育程度低，而且居住条件很差。
